author: coffee-cogs
install_msg: Thanks for installing :') Come make pull requests over at my GitHub! https://github.com/coffeebank/coffee-cogs
name: msgmover
short: Move messages across channels and servers
description: Copy messages into a new channel, or link up two channels within a server/across servers! Uses webhooks with profiles and nicknames to forward messages around.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
